TestFrame.Name: Config_DUT_CT
TestFrame.TemplateText: .Config_DUT_CT&#013-- Configure the DUT as a CT&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATACLEAR&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0000 + 12 EE&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0001 + 12 01 --01 Write&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0002 + 12 0E --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0003 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0004 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0005 + 12 00 --Data&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0006 + 12 02 --Data -- 1:VT, 2:CT&#013.END&#013
